name: SnowReportforToggenburgMountain
0:
”Alexa, open Toggenburg Mountain”

Invocation Name: toggenburg mountain
des: The Toggenburg Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions, base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
